original_text: Now the glory of the God of Israel had gone up from the cherub on which it rested to the threshold of the house. And he called to the man clothed in linen, who had the writing case at his waist.
korean_text: 그룹에 머물러 있던 이스라엘 하나님의 영광이 성전 문지방에 이르더니 여호와께서 그 가는 베 옷을 입고 서기관의 먹 그릇을 찬 사람을 불러

sentences.original_text: Now the glory of the God of Israel had gone up
from the cherub on which it rested
to the threshold of the house.
And he called to the man clothed in linen,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 아마 입은 사람을 불렀다

sentences.original_text: who had the writing case at his waist.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 허리춤에 서기 도구를 가지고 있었다
